input.sentences: we went to a rally in location location for [male] mandela .
the protestors were hoping to get [male] mandela free .

output.sentences: A young man attended a rally to free Mandela.
There were many other male protestors there beating drums for Mandela.
Other children holding signs pleaing for Mandela's release were being photographed to spread sympathy.
Other media outlets were also there, interviewing protestors.
Together the people protested the rights of immigrants everywhere.
